title: Font similar to TheSans
content: I'm looking for a font similar to TheSans that is supplied with standard Microsoft office products. Does anybody have any good ideas? Thanks.
author: jedmonson1

comments.content: Um, [Calibri](http://web.archive.org/web/20140325124829/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calibri) seems like the obvious answer – it is, at least, by the same designer.

If you need something more extensive than Calibri then have a gander at FF Zwo. It’s a sanitized TheSans:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_zwo\_collection/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140325124829/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_zwo_collection/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_zwo\_collection/")
